items.content_html: GetMusic-Lite is a simple, frontend-only music website featuring a sleek dark theme, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users can play, pause, and control music through interactive buttons. Designed for speed and ease of use, it requires no backend, making it ideal for personal projects, learning, or lightweight browser-based music playback.
items.title: CyberlordSY/GetMusic-Lite: GetMusic-Lite is a simple, frontend-only music website featuring a sleek dark theme, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users can play, pause, and control music through interactive buttons. Designed for speed and ease of use, it requires no backend, making it ideal for personal projects, learning, or lightweight browser-based music playback.

items.content_html: Store is a lightweight shared state library by the StencilJS core team. Implements a simple key/value map that efficiently re-renders components when necessary.

items.content_html: Notes App is a lightweight browser-based note-taking tool with color-coding, categorization, and search features. Pin important notes, toggle dark mode, and resize notes as needed. Built with JavaScript and IndexedDB for offline storage, it requires no server to run.RetryClaude can make mistakes. Please double-check responses.
